pageContent: Background: Choice of prostate cancer treatment is frequently influenced by the expected chance of treatment-induced side effects such as erectile dysfunction (ED). However, great discrepancy in cited ED rates exists in the contemporary radiation therapy literature.

metaData.source:
Comparison of health-related quality-of-life outcomes for African-American and Caucasian-American men after radical prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22429893/
